justification: Vendor 2 'offers real-time alerting and notification capabilities,' including 'role-based notifications, condition-based alerts, and escalation workflows,' aligning with the requirement to 'display and manage alerts...triggers, and notifications.' However, the response lacks direct mention of 'message queues' and does not specify the full extent of alert/message management. The interface list and compliance information support secure and resilient delivery but do not address message/alert display or manual intervention in depth.
ability: The ability to display and manage alerts, messages, message queues, triggers, and notifications
